member_organisations: National associations are represented by up to 3 delegates at an annual meeting that determines constitutional matters and approves actions with daily management conducted by an elected Executive of 10 persons. In Europe around 1.3 million firefighters are engaged.
fields_of_interest: Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Research and innovation, Climate Action, Borders and Security
head_office_address: CTIF Permanent Office Firefighters Association Slovenia Trzaska 221
eu_initiatives: Development of effective civil protection arrangements and associated research into safety and security together with employment and health issues related to firefighters and overall protection of the public.
organisation_name: International Fire and Rescue Services Association (CTIF)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Federation of European Fire Officers 
Fire Protection Association Europe 
National Fire Protection Association USA
relevant_communication: Participation in Horizon 2020 and relevant DG ECHO programmes and initiatives. Liaison and participation in policy and development of matters impacting on public safety from fire and crisis and the employment, protection and safety of firefighters and associated service workers.
goals__remit: Exchange of good practice and technical information related to improving firefighting and fire safety
